title: garen ult passive bug!
body: when I first lvl the garen's ult (when I reached 6), it worked, the last champ I killed is marked as villain, however, after I used garen's ult to kill someone, the villain is gone, and when the ult's cd was finished, the champion I killed was not marked as villain!

replies.body: Heya!  This is probably working as intended.  After killing the villain, they will no longer be the villain unless they do something (like getting a kill) to become the villain again.  If no one else had enough kills / assists, then there might not be another villain yet.  You've just got to slow down on delivering so much justice :P

HI,

Thanks for the report - I'll pass it on to the relevant people to test further.

Cheers
